title: girijayAajayA abhayAmbikayA
sahitya:
P:  girijayAjayA abhayAmbikayA girIsha jAyayA rakSitOham A:  harihayAdi devatArAdhitayA Atma svarUpa prabhOdhitayA harihara guruguha sammOditayA AdikSAnta varNa vEditayA caraNam    samaya vishESa niryANamukha bIja nirbIja dIkSA viSaya karaNa
samayA caraNOpayOga pUjA sAmagrI sangrahAntah-karaNa
samaya mata pratipAdyAnusaraNa sAmAnya vishESa prajAcaraNa
mamatva nirAkaraNa kriyAyuta sadbhaktAnAm dharmArttha rUpa
samatva vrtti vitaraNa nipuNatara sAmrAjya pradA ruNa caraNayA
